attributes.title: Nope 🤡🟠
attributes.review: This has to be one of the worst apps I’ve ever seen I don’t know why I downloaded it I thought maybe I could find a reason to like trump but no delete this bs NOW

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This is the absolute worst experience on an app that I have ever had. Would not recommend. This app is so buggy it makes me not like Trump

attributes.title: DO NOT download this app
attributes.review: This app messed up my phone for a long time I just got it fixed but I had to pay a lot of money to get it fixed so DO NOT download this app

attributes.title: Horrible app 😐
attributes.review: I hated it so much it almost gave me a heart attack. And seeing all the other reviews it gave me chills so I had to see what it was about and I wish I never opened it 🤦🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: Horrible just very horrible a very trash app like if I could give if ZERO stars I would. One time it heard me say I was black and a giant monkey popped on my screen and said “ ooo ooo ahh ahh vote for trump” crazy right.

attributes.title: hehe
attributes.review: One of the worst apps it kept glitching and it kept leaving the app to the home page. It also doesn’t let me vote like how am I suppose to for the these ugly oops sorry I mean very nice handsome man!!!

attributes.title: O. M. G
attributes.review: This app almost made me DIE. I was walking down the road while looking at the app and a EAGLE swooped my phone out of my hands and in when I got it back, I fell of a bridge!!! I blame it completely on this app. All it’s fault!!!

attributes.title: Ads and crashing and other
attributes.review: This is not a good app it has a add every time I click a button and it crashed so bad and I don’t like trump

attributes.title: Where are the plans???
attributes.review: Lots of attacks and articles about community support for the campaign, but nothing about plans to help middle class or the country.

attributes.title: Ugh
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD I had to restart my whole entire phone to get it to work again. Also my cat got rabies from what the app was telling me to do. I 200% do not recommend.
